Package ui

package ui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AnalyticsController
    Analytics controller for creating graphs and displaying them on analytics page
    Checkout
    The Checkout class serves as the main entry point for the JavaFX application.
    CheckoutController
    Controller class for managing the checkout process in the POS system.
    Controller
    An abstract class representing a generic Controller for the UI.
    EmployeeController
    Controller class for handling employee-related UI actions and interactions.
    EmployeeEditController
    Controller class for employee edit form.
    EmployeeOverrideController
    Controller for Employee Override screen.
    InProgressOrderItem
    The InProgressOrderIem Class represents an inventory item in the in progress order table, complete with all of the attributes from the inventory table
    InventoryAdjustmentsController
    The InventoryAdjustmentsController Class controls the inventory adjustments page, including the inventory item description table and button that recieve ordered inventory
    InventoryItem
    The InventoryItem Class represents an inventory item in the inventory table, complete with all of the attributes from the inventory table
    InventoryOrderingController
    The InventoryOrderingController Class controls the inventory ordering page, including the inventory item description table and the table that stores items for an in progress order
    Main
    Main class for loading application instance.
    MainController
    The MainController class handles the main login interface of the application.
    ManagerController
     
    MenuEditorController
    Controller class for managing the menu editor screen, displaying the available menu items and allowing users to edit or add new items.
    MenuItemEditController
    Controller for editing menu items in the system.
    ReportsController
    Controller for Reports screen.
    RestockReportController
    The RestockReportController Class controls the restock report page, grabbing and displaying all of the items that need to be restocked
